verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ ׀ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and י֬וֹנַת <S%H3123><s%> dove אֵ֣לֶם <S%H482><s%> congregation רְ֭חֹקִים <S%H7350><s%> far abroad לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִכְתָּ֑ם <S%H4387><s%> Michtam בֶּֽאֱחֹ֨ז <S%H270><s%> took אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> פְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <S%H6430><s%> when the Philistines בְּגַֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> him in Gath חָנֵּ֣נִי <S%H2603><s%> Be merciful אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> unto me O God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁאָפַ֣נִי <S%H7602><s%> would swallow me up אֱנ֑וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> for man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily לֹחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> he fighting יִלְחָצֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3905><s%> oppresseth

שָׁאֲפ֣וּ <S%H7602><s%> swallow שׁ֭וֹרְרַי <S%H8324><s%> Mine enemies כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> would daily כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבִּ֨ים <S%H7227><s%> [me] up for [they be] many לֹחֲמִ֖ים <S%H3898><s%> that fight לִ֣י מָרֽוֹם׃ <S%H4791><s%> against me O thou most High
י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> What time אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> I am afraid אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶבְטָֽח׃ <S%H982><s%> I will trust

בֵּאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> In God אֲהַלֵּ֪ל <S%H1984><s%> I will praise דְּבָ֫ר֥וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> in God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> I have put my trust לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> I will not fear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> can do בָשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> what flesh לִֽי׃

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> Every day דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> my words יְעַצֵּ֑בוּ <S%H6087><s%> they wrest עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> are against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֣ם <S%H4284><s%> all their thoughts לָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> [are] against me for evil

יָג֤וּרוּ ׀ <S%H1481><s%> They gather themselves together [יַצְפִּינוּ כ] (יִצְפֹּ֗ונוּ <S%H6845><s%> reserve ק) הֵ֭מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like עֲקֵבַ֣י <S%H6119><s%> my steps יִשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> themselves they mark כַּ֝אֲשֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> as they קִוּ֥וּ <S%H6960><s%> when they wait נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> for my soul

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> of wickedness פַּלֶּט־ <S%H6405><s%> Shall they escape לָ֑מוֹ בְּ֝אַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> anger עַמִּ֤ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> the people הוֹרֵ֬ד <S%H3381><s%> cast down אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> O God

נֹדִי֮ <S%H5112><s%> my wanderings סָפַ֪רְתָּ֫ה <S%H5608><s%> Thou tellest אָ֥תָּה <S%H859><s%> you שִׂ֣ימָה <S%H7760><s%> put דִמְעָתִ֣י <S%H1832><s%> thou my tears בְנֹאדֶ֑ךָ <S%H4997><s%> into thy bottle הֲ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not בְּסִפְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5612><s%> bill

אָ֥֨ז <S%H227><s%> Then יָ֘שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> turn אוֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> [unto thee] then shall mine enemies אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> back בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> When אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> I cry זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> This יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> this I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> for God לִֽי׃

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> In God אֲהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> will I praise דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> [his] word בַּ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD אֲהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> will I praise דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> [his] word

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> In God בָּ֭טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> have I put my trust לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> I will not be afraid מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What יַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> can do אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> what man לִֽי׃
עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> [are] upon me O God נְדָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H5088><s%> Thy vows אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> I will render תּוֹדֹ֣ת <S%H8426><s%> praises לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הִצַּ֪לְתָּ <S%H5337><s%> For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֡י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִמָּוֶת֮ <S%H4194><s%> from death הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Indeed רַגְלַ֗י <S%H7272><s%> [wilt] not [thou deliver] my feet מִ֫דֶּ֥חִי <S%H1762><s%> from falling לְ֭הִֽתְהַלֵּךְ <S%H1980><s%> that I may walk לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּ֝א֗וֹר <S%H216><s%> in the light הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living
